entry.title: WIND WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: E 60 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
